QueryResult.text: SELECT ASSIGNEES.ID, ASSIGNEES.PK_ID, ASSIGNEES.TABLE_NAME, ASSIGNEES.IS_NEW, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE, RESOURCES.FULL_NAME, RESOURCES.FIRST_NAME, RESOURCES.LAST_NAME, NULL FROM BPM_RUN_REPLACE_ASSIGNEES ASSIGNEES, SRM_RESOURCES RESOURCES WHERE RESOURCES.ID = ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID AND RESOURCES.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE IN ('BPM_ASSIGNEE_RESOURCE','BPM_ASSIGNEE_ROLE') UNION SELECT ASSIGNEES.ID, ASSIGNEES.PK_ID, ASSIGNEES.TABLE_NAME, ASSIGNEES.IS_NEW, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID, ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE, USER_GROUPS.GROUP_NAME, '', '', USER_GROUPS.LANGUAGE_CODE LANGUAGE_CODE FROM BPM_RUN_REPLACE_ASSIGNEES ASSIGNEES, CMN_SEC_GROUPS_V USER_GROUPS WHERE USER_GROUPS.ID = ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_ID AND ASSIGNEES.PRINCIPAL_TYPE_CODE = 'BPM_ASSIGNEE_GROUP'
